channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Judge Mathis
channel.desc: A man was friends with the defendant until, he says, he discovered she was a prostitute and was trying to convince his wife to become one as well.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Crime Expos? With Nancy O'Dell
channel.desc: The body of a 14-year-old girl is found near a bike trail.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Divorce Court
channel.desc: Judge Star Jones uses her wisdom and experience as she presides over the courtroom, hearing disputes involving the highs and lows of relationships.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: Adam's girlfriend, Brea, heads to visit her cousin at the University of Virginia; Beverly projects her own insecurity onto Adam, convincing him to make a grand gesture to prevent Brea from choosing UVA for college.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: Erica's world opens when she befriends another young mom; Barry and Adam team up for a money-making performance inspired by a kooky '80s educational entertainer.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Family Feud
channel.desc: Steve Harvey hosts; two families compete to guess the answers to various surveys.

channel.title: Family Feud
channel.desc: Steve Harvey hosts; two families compete to guess the answers to various surveys.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Bob Hearts Abishola
channel.desc: Bob, a middle-aged compression-sock salesman, unexpectedly falls for his cardiac nurse, Abishola, a Nigerian immigrant, while recovering from a heart attack and sets his sights on winning her over.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Bob Hearts Abishola
channel.desc: When Bob, Abishola and Kemi learn that Morenike's family disowned her because she's gay, they do what they can to help her pay for school and stay in America.

channel.title: Young Sheldon
channel.desc: Missy steals her dad George's truck and runs away from her house; she hits the road with her friend Paige.
